sentences.sContent: Billy continued to stand there, mute and defiant.
sentences.sCn: 比利还是站在那儿一声不吭，一副不服气的样子。

synos.tran: 哑的；沉默的；[电影]无声的

remMethod.val: 遥控器上的Mute键表示“静音”

words.tran: 使柔和（mute的过去式和过去分词）；消除声音

trans.tranCn: 哑的； 缄默的；弱化的， 微弱的
trans.tranOther: someone who is mute does not speak, or refuses to speak
a small piece of metal, rubber etc that you place over or into a musical instrument to make it sound softer
to make the sound of something quieter, or make it disappear completely
